**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Drazmorg the Damned](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2174) **Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 92 **Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +17, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +17, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +15, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +13, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +15, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +13, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +6 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +2 **Items** [_Drazmorg's Staff of All-Sight_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1728), _[In the Shadows of Toil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1731)_ --- **AC** 23 **Fort** +13 **Ref** +15 **Will** +17 **HP** 115 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Final Spite** **Trigger** The wight is reduced to 0 Hit Points. **Effect** The wight makes a Strike before being destroyed. It doesn't gain any temporary HP from drain life on this Strike. --- **Speed** fly 25 feet **Melee** claw +15, **Damage** 2d6+4 plus drain life **Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 25, attack +17 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) - **2nd** [False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Spectral Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=295) - **3rd** [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) - **4th** [Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141) **Drain Life** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When the wight damages a living creature with its claw Strike, the wight gains 3 temporary Hit Points and the creature must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save or become [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10). Further damage dealt by the wraith increases the amount of drain by 1 on a failed save to a maximum of drained 4. **Raise Bone Wall** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** Drazmorg is in the Lower Vault of Droskar's Crucible; **Effect** Drazmorg draws upon the necromantic energy that infuses the area and causes a tangled wall of bones to rise from the ground. The wall is 5 feet thick, 10 feet wide, and 10 feet tall; once created, it's permanent until Drazmorg uses this ability again, whereupon a previously created bone wall (such as the one at area G2) crumbles. The bone wall has AC 10, Hardness 10, and 25 Hit Points. It's immune to critical hits and precision damage, and it heals damage to itself at a rate of 2d6 Hit Points at the end of a round. Everything on each side of the wall has [greater cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459) from creatures on the opposite side, and the wall can't be moved through. A destroyed section of the wall of bones can be moved through freely and no longer heals damage. A creature caught in a space when a bone wall is created must attempt a DC 25 Reflex save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected, and the bone wall fails to form in any square occupied by that creature.
**Success** The creature is forced into an adjacent square of its choice as the bone wall forms in its previous space.
**Failure** As success, but the creature is also knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the creature also takes 4d6 piercing and 4d6 bludgeoning damage from the force of being struck by the bone wall. **Wight Spawn** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A living [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) slain by a wight's claw Strike rises as a [wight](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=163) after 1d4 rounds. This wight spawn is under the command of the wight that killed it. It doesn't have Drain Life or Wight Spawn and becomes [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for as long as it is a wight spawn. If the creator of the wight spawn dies, the wight spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous wight; it regains its free will, gains Drain Life and Wight Spawn, and is no longer clumsy.
name: Drazmorg the Damned
